GitStats 0.1.0.9012

    A EngineRest class

    EngineRest.Rd

    A superclass for methods wrapping Rest API responses.

    Public fields

    rest_api_url

    A character, url of Rest API.

    Methods

    Public methods

    • EngineRest$new()

    • EngineRest$response()

    • EngineRest$check_organizations()

    • EngineRest$clone()

    Method new()

    Create a new Rest object

    Usage

    EngineRest$new(rest_api_url = NA, token = NA, scan_all = FALSE)

    Arguments

    rest_api_url

    A character, url of Rest API.

    token

    A token.

    scan_all

    A boolean.

    Returns

    A Rest object.

    Method response()

    A wrapper for httr2 functions to perform get request to REST API endpoints.

    Usage

    EngineRest$response(endpoint, token = private$token)

    Arguments

    endpoint

    An API endpoint.

    token

    A token.

    Returns

    A content of response formatted to list.

    Method check_organizations()

    Check if an organization exists

    Usage

    EngineRest$check_organizations(orgs)

    Arguments

    orgs

    A character vector of organizations

    Returns

    orgs or NULL.

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    EngineRest$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
